name: Woodland (Jodix)
description:
Wander through the woods and collect botanicals. 

Find the alchemist's lodge to combine them into drinks for your archives. Interact with the tables at the back :)

Creatures coming soon :D Also the book isn't in game lol - you'll just have to imagine that.

Controls:

SPACE = interact

i = Open inventory

Esc = Close current window

Mouse clicks and stuff = select items for combination

Used https://itch.io/profile/gtibo for the character mode
